channel.title: How do you change level requirements?
channel.description: Well I tried looknig around in my files to see if I could figure out how to do it myslef but I couldn't find a way to change it so could someone please tell me how?

item.title: How do you change level requirements?
item.dc:creator: @MJS252 MJS252
item.description:
@MJS252 wrote:

search for

/*Equipment level checking*/

You should see something like this:

if (ItemName.startsWith("Bronze")) {
				return 1;
			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Iron")) {
				return 1;
			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Steel")) {
				return 5;
			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Black")) {
				return 135;
			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Mithril")) {
				return 20;
			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Adamant")) {
				return 30;
			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Rune")) {
				return 40;
			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Dragon")) {
				return 60;
			} else if (ItemName.startsWith("White")) {
				return 135;
			}
		} else if (ItemName.startsWith("Granite")) {
			return 50;
		} else if (ItemName.endsWith("whip") || ItemName.endsWith("Ahrims staff") || ItemName.endsWith("Torags hammers") || ItemName.endsWith("Veracs flail") || ItemName.endsWith("Guthans warspear") || ItemName.endsWith("Dharoks greataxe")) {
			return 70;
		}
		return 1;
	}

after just change the number after the return.

the first group is attack second is defence and below them is strength, mage and range

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change level requirements?
